remarks: Lemma for ~ xpsxmet .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
statement:
xpsds.t $e |- T = ( R Xs. S ) $.
xpsds.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
xpsds.y $e |- Y = ( Base ` S ) $.
xpsds.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
xpsds.2 $e |- ( ph -> S e. W ) $.
xpsds.p $e |- P = ( dist ` T ) $.
xpsds.m $e |- M = ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( X X. X ) ) $.
xpsds.n $e |- N = ( ( dist ` S ) |` ( Y X. Y ) ) $.
xpsds.3 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( *Met ` X ) ) $.
xpsds.4 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( *Met ` Y ) ) $.
xpsxmetlem $p |- ( ph -> ( dist ` ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ `' ( { R } +c { S } ) ) ) e. ( *Met ` ran ( x e. X , y e. Y |-> `' ( { x } +c { y } ) ) ) ) $.
$d M x $.
$d N x $.
$d R x $.
$d S x $.
$d W x $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d ph x $.
